title: Employee Portal Inner Page
reference-overview: The Employee Portal Inner Page is the foundation of the site, able to contain all manner of information in a variety of presentation styles. It follows all previously established tenets of Mobile Responsiveness.
reference-usage: Primary method of presenting detailed information to the site user. The Inner Page supports all varieties of content presentation - graphical, tabular, text based, etc. It is intended as a flexible container.
reference-details: You may utilize all other aspects of site design within this container.
